reviews.title: Name Is 4Minute photos?
reviews.comment: Please update with 4Minute\'s new songs and photos for the alarm and widget ^^
reviews.author: Juliana Yue

reviews.title: A Fun Way to wake up
reviews.comment: I like this a lot. Only a couple quibbles: 1) The alarm function only works in the morning, I\'d love a 24 hr alarm. 2) Have an interior volume control in the app itself. It\'s annoying to have to reset my  ringtone volume after I wake up. 3) Have a setting like \"crescendo\" where the sound starts low and gets louder.  Other than these issues, thoroughly enjoyable.  -- 4nia 4 life
reviews.author: Eric Wirsing

reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: 4Minute Mania!
reviews.comment: All 4nias would definitely need this!  It has an hourly reminder with your favourite member, basic alarm functions with 4Minute\'s voices, etc. Everything is 4Minute based<3 Also, the widget tells you the time conveniently from your home screen. The app is updated with pictures from Volume Up already. :D  This app keeps this 4nia here always happy ^^ Oh yes and B2uties should stop spamming here, requesting for a free version for B2ST :)
reviews.author: A Google User
